p: Inter-country comparison between published studies is complicated because the population surveyed, implementation time and scope and diagnostic assay varied by study region [ 35, 36, 37]. Similar results to our estimate of 4.3% in <40-year-olds that experienced one known epidemic in South Africa were detected on the island of Mayotte in 2011 (4.1%; 58/1413) [ 38], four years after RVF had emerged in humans in 2007.
